title: Children Are Not for Sale Act
subject: Children & Domestic Matters
Health Care & Health Insurance
Professions & Occupations

abstracts.abstract: The bill adds trading anything of monetary value to buy or sell sexual activity with a minor who the person knows is being trafficked for sexual servitude as an act of human trafficking of a minor for sexual servitude. The bill changes the penalty of human trafficking of a minor for sexual servitude from a class 2 felony to a class 1 felony and requires the court to sentence a person convicted of the felony to life imprisonment without the possibility of parole.(Note: This summary applies to this bill as introduced.)

actions.description: Introduced In House - Assigned to Judiciary
